org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

Class BasicFiltersConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.BasicFiltersConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmpFiltersConverter

    public abstract class BasicFiltersConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    a NiFilters converter which does the job (through subclasses, if necessary) in Basic or AMP-like filtering schemas. The generated NiFilters instance is an instance of PassiveNiFilters The specification is too big to fit in here, please refer to https://wiki.dgfoundation.org/display/AMPDOC/3.+NiReports+runtime#id-3.NiReportsruntime-3.5Filteringruntime

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      supplemental predicate to be applied to the activityIds generated by the other rules
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.function.Predicate<Cell>>> cellPredicates
      predicates to apply to the cells of a given column
      protected java.util.Map<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage,java.util.List<java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.Coordinate>>> coosPredicates
      predicates to be applied to the coordinates of all the cells in the report which respond to a given NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage
      protected NiReportsEngine engine
      the context which uses this instance
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> filteringColumns
      columns whose actIds are to be a limiting superset of the ids which would make it into the report
      protected java.util.Map<ReportElement,FilterRule> rawRules
      the rules, as enumerated in ReportSpecification.getFilters()
      protected NiReportsSchema schema
      the schema which referenced this converter
      protected ReportSpecification spec
